dmca.title: Copyright Infringement, DMCA - http://rsdeals.com/
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Saturday, April 07, 2007 11:37 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright Infringement, DMCA - http://rsdeals.com/
[ThePlanetAbuse-C3787562O]

This message was received concerns a matter from a source deemed
important enough for auto-forwarding. It is being forwarded to you for
review and applicable action.

Abuse Department
The Planet


=====================
Original Message
=====================
X-MailFrom: copyright@jagex.com
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Sun Apr 8 04:36:40 2007
Received: (qmail 29771 invoked by alias); 8 Apr 2007 09:36:38 -0000
Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: (qmail 29767 invoked from network); 8 Apr 2007 09:36:37 -0000
Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110)
  by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 8 Apr 2007 09:36:37 -0000
Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by
smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
         Sun, 8 Apr 2007 04:36:37 -0500
Return-path: <copyright@jagex.com>
Delivery-date: Sun, 08 Apr 2007 04:36:37 -0500

helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)
        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from copyright@jagex.com)
        with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
        (Exim)
        id 1HaTp7-0005oE-1O
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 08 Apr 2007 04:36:37 -0500
Received: from mail.jagex.com ([212.44.19.197])
        by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from copyright@jagex.com)
        with esmtps (TLSv1:AES256-SHA:256)
        (Exim)
        id 1HaTp3-000G2M-4R
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 08 Apr 2007 04:36:33 -0500
Received: from [146.101.150.31] (helo=jagex.com)
        by mail.jagex.com with smtp (Exim 4.50)
        id 1HaToz-0001PF-LL
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 08 Apr 2007 10:36:29 +0100
User-Agent: Jagex-Email-Sender
From: Jagex Copyright Team <copyright@jagex.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement, DMCA - http://rsdeals.com/ 
Message-Id: <E1HaToz-0001PF-LL@mail.jagex.com>
Date: Sun, 08 Apr 2007 10:36:29 +0100
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 08 Apr 2007 09:36:37.0335 (UTC)
FILETIME=[67601E70:01C779C1]

To whom it may concern,

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am the owner or am
authorised to act on behalf of the copyright owner. The information in
the notification is accurate. I have good faith to belief that the use
of the material identified below has not been authorised by the owner,
its agents or the law. Please promptly remove the infringing material or
disable access to it in accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright
Act.

Name of the Intellectual Property Owner: Jagex Limited, UK registered
company number 03982706.

Name and/or description of the copyrighted work which has been
infringed: Images of RuneScape items.

Description of the Infringing Material: Many images of items from within
the RuneScape gold, including but not limited to gold, armour and
weapons.

Location of the Infringing Material: http://rsdeals.com/ 

This site also offers RuneScape items in exchange for actual currency.
This is strictly forbidden by our terms of service, and therefore
constitutes inducement to breach of contract.

I can be contacted at:

Name: Matthew Partridge
Email: copyright@jagex.com

Regards,

Matthew Partridge
Jagex Ltd.

-- 

IMPORTANT NOTICE

The sender does not guarantee that this message, including any
attachment, is secure or virus free. Also, it is confidential and may be
privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure. If you are not the
intended recipient, do not disclose or copy it or its contents. Please
telephone or email the sender and delete the message entirely from your
system.
Jagex Limited is a company registered in England & Wales with company
number 03982706 and a registered office at St. Andrews House, 90 St.
Andrews Road, Cambridge, CB4 1DL, UK.
